title: Designing an OTT Platform to enthrall the audience
description: A redesign for a corporate website for a company that offers 40+ cloud solutions and have over 50+ customer stories.
summary: An over-the-top (OTT) video streaming app that offers exclusive content to its users.
The project aimed to create an intuitive and engaging interface for users to browse and access the app's content seamlessly.
